relevant_findings.HEENT: No sclera icterus. Moist mucous membranes.
relevant_findings.skin: Multiple tattoos, petechiae scattered over arms and chest.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Regular rate and rhythm with no excess sounds appreciated.
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally with no wheezing, rales, or rhonchi.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Distended but soft; dullness to percussion over dependent areas; tympanic anteriorly; positive for hepatomegaly; mild diffuse tenderness, more so over RUQ.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm and well perfused, no edema, clubbing or cyanosis; ecchymotic areas on left orbital, left elbow, left patella, and left hip with subcutaneous hardening/calcification over left orbit.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Worsening pruritus described as generalized itching including palms/soles, damaging her skin; residual bruising/soreness on her left orbital, left elbow, left knee, and left hip.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Worsening pruritus over the past month; residual bruising from previous fall.
